mean_cn: n. 漏洞，枪眼，换气孔，射弹孔
mean_en: an error in the way a law, rule, or contract is written that makes it possible for some people to legally avoid obeying it
word_etyma: loop 环 + hole孔 → n. 漏洞；枪眼；换气孔；射弹孔
short_phrase: find a loophole in the contract
sentence: Too bad we didn't realize the agreement had a legal loophole!
sentence_trans: 糟糕，我们没有意识到这份合同有一个法律漏洞！
